headline.main: HOLD OF INVADERS ON PHILIPPINES THIN; Trip Discloses People Are Loyal to U.S. and Wondering When Tokyo Will Be Bombed ONLY 5 ISLANDS OCCUPIED And These Among 7,000 Are Not Conquered -- Filipinos Await Their Deliverance

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, April 2 -- By far the greatest part of the Philippines, both in territory and in population, still is free of the Japanese invader and still is under the American flag. The people are unwavering in their loyalty to the United States, although considerably puzzled over the Allies' continued withdrawals and their failure to take the initiative against Japan.
abstract: C Lee on P I situation
